channel.title: Creating 317 Highscores
channel.description:
Hi guys! I was following the guide here but I keep getting an error!
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
My Source Code is from Revival-RS https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=659091.0
[sup]com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlDataTruncation: Data truncation: Out of range value for column 'lvl' at row 1 [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:4094) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:4028) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:2490) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:2651) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.java:2677) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.executeUpdate(StatementImpl.java:1748) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.executeUpdate(StatementImpl.java:1665) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.rs2.util.sql.SQL.query(SQL.java:30) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.rs2.util.sql.SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:143) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.rs2.model.players.Player.logout(Player.java:1665) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.rs2.Server.cycle(Server.java:364) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:223) [7/28/14 10:29 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/sup]

item.title: Creating 317 Highscores
item.dc:creator: @jerkpar jerkpar
item.description:
@jerkpar wrote:

Hi guys! I was following the guide here but I keep getting an error!

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
